name: Pixel Craft 3D
description:
Pixel Craft 3D is a classic survival game set in a beautifully-realized pixel world.

Welcome to the beautiful and dangerous world of Pixel Craft 3D! Your initial goals are to find food and drink, collect resources and craft tools. But beware of monsters sneaking up on you!

HOW TO PLAY: Use the right and left arrow keys to control your character's movement. Use the red button to attack and to collect resources.

Game features:
- survival game free
- cool pixel art
- old school gameplay
- too many items

Pixel Craft 3D – it’s time for fun! Explore every pixel of the map, upgrade your equipment, but watch your back!
